ModMetaData.name: Make Your Bulk
ModMetaData.author: AlenDio
ModMetaData.description: ^^ Put the mod on top of all others ^^ Tired of crafting items one by one? This mod allows you to automatically make new Bulk recipes based on existing ones. How to use Go to "Settings -> Mod Options -> Make Your Bulk". - Add Recipe: Select an existing recipe to create its bulk version. (REQUIRED restart) - Remove Recipe: Remove a previously created bulk recipe. (REQUIRED restart) - Copy Recipe: Copy a previously created bulk recipe. - Rename Recipe: Rename a previously created bulk recipe. (REQUIRED restart) - Reset list: Remove every bulk recipes. - Save/Load list: Allows to save and then load an already created list. Features - BulkUnfinishedThing: Allow partially completed items to be stored and resumed later. (REQUIRED restart) - Same Quality: All the products of the recipe will have the same quality. (REQUIRED restart) - Products Multiplier: Set how many products will be produced. (REQUIRED restart) - Work Amount Multiplier: Set the percentage of the amount of work. (NOT-required restart) - Cost Multiplier: Set the percentage of the cost of the ingredients. (NOT-required restart)
